data.taskTitle: why did new task drawer give this console log
data.approach: Investigating Error: fetch failed in fetchSuggestions. The error occurs when calling /api/tasks/suggest endpoint. Need to check: 1) If API key is configured, 2) Server-side error handling, 3) Network connectivity issues

summary: Created plan for centralized API key management UI
findings: Current state: keys in .bashrc or .env - not user-friendly
Proposed: Settings UI with masked key display and verification
Foundation for agent-agnostic support (Claude Code, Aider, Codex, etc.)

data.approach: Implementing Phase 1: 1) credentials.ts utility, 2) API endpoint, 3) CredentialsEditor component, 4) Add tab to ConfigTabs, 5) Update config page, 6) Update suggest endpoint

summary: Added Custom API Keys feature to Settings â†’ API Keys tab
Users can define their own API keys with custom env var names
Created squad-secret bash tool for retrieving secrets in scripts/hooks
Integrated credentials system with Supabase panel
Updated documentation: CHANGELOG, CLAUDE.md, README, tools.md

patterns: Use squad-secret <name> to retrieve secrets in scripts
